title: Fact Vs Fiction: Zee News Accused Of Morphing An Armed Rioter’s Image
subtitle: Fact Vs Fiction: Fake News Of The Week.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Watch episode-26 where we discuss whether Zee News morphed an armed rioter’s image to make him look like a Muslim and whether TMC workers vandalised their party’s office on being stopped by Mamata Banerjee from singing Vande Mataram.

In this video we cover the following stories:

Netizens Raise Question Of Media Bias Over Zee News’ Visual Of An Armed Rioter

Did TMC Workers Create A Ruckus After Mamata Banerjee Barred Them From Singing ‘Vande Mataram’?: A FactCheck
